sentences.cn: 当代社会习俗和性观念

sentences.en: Even in the more rural areas , experts say , sexual mores are changing at a rapid pace.
sentences.cn: 甚至在更偏远的地区, 性观念也在快速改变.

sentences.en: I love the wide neck mores so than the others personally.
sentences.cn: 个人来讲,我更爱这款宽口奶瓶.

sentences.en: Likewise, for most people, religious or political convictions or sexual mores are considered private matters.
sentences.cn: 同样地, 对大多数人而言, 宗教信仰、政治立场及性观念等话题也都属于个人隐私.

sentences.en: Many blame these changes on the decay of traditional mores.
sentences.cn: 许多人将这些改变怪罪于传统道德观念受到遗弃.

sentences.en: The essential element in the mores and in personal morality is consistency.
sentences.cn: 民风民德,以及个人道德中首要的因素是其连贯性.

sentences.en: The Typees are physically beautiful , relaxed in their sexual mores.
sentences.cn: 泰皮人身体健壮, 男女关系自由随便.

words.tran_cn: 习惯，习俗；风俗；道德观念

phrases.tran_cn: 需要更多信息；取得进一步资讯
更多信息；详细信息；更多资料

trans.tran_en: the customs, social behaviour, and moral values of a particular group
